description: Number of possible chess games at the end of the n-th ply plus number of games that terminate (i.e., mate) in fewer than n plies.
comments: This sequence is A048987 plus the cumulative sum of A079485. - Richard Bean (rwb(AT)eskimo.com), Jun 18 2003
references: James Gleick, Faster, Vintage Books, NY, 2000 (see pp. 259-261).
links: Index entries for sequences related to number of chess games
author: Ken Thompson (ken(AT)google.com)
extensions: Three more terms from _François Labelle_, Jan 22 2004
a(11) from _François Labelle_, Jul 25 2004, who thanks Joost de Heer for providing computer time
